actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to increase mortgage and income limits under homeownership assistance programs administered by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.

summary.text: Increases mortgage and income limits under the National Housing Act for homeownership assistance programs administered by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.

titles.title: A bill to increase mortgage and income limits under homeownership assistance programs administered by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.
